gl.description: Defines the country to use for search. Head to Google countries page for a full list of supported countries.

device.description: Device to use to get the results

no_cache.description: Whether to force SerpApi to fetch the Google results even if a cached version is already present. Cache expires after 1h. Cached searches are free, and are not counted towards your searches per month.

google_domain.description: Defines the domain to use for search. Head to Google domains page for a full list of supported domains.

hl.description: Defines the language to use. It's a two-letter language code. (e.g., `en` for English, `es` for Spanish, or `fr` for French). Head to Google languages page for a full list of supported languages.
